main event: A strange disc-shaped object was observed near Ft. Davis, Texas on April 19, 1953.
interesting points: The object appeared to be floating and moving with the vapor trail of an airplane.
The object accelerated rapidly and moved at an uncanny speed, much faster than any jet plane.
The object appeared to swing in an arc towards the north and then reappeared to the southwest of the Davis mountains.
The observer initially thought the object might be a balloon released by the airplane, but it was not spherical in shape.
The object did not appear to be glowing or giving off any light, despite its high altitude.
